nodes.text: The "Grievance Striker," also known as the "Annihilator," was a custom DT-57 "Annihilator" blaster owned by General Grievous, the Supreme Commander of the Separatist Droid Army during the Clone Wars. During the battle of Utapau, Jedi General Obi-Wan Kenobi used the Grievance Striker to shoot Grievous, ironically causing the cyborg general to die by his own weapon.
